Title: Gravity Falls
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Mystery, Sci-Fi
Actors: Jason Ritter, Alex Hirsch, Kristen Schaal, Linda Cardellini
Plot: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic town of Gravity Falls.
Awards: Won 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 11 wins & 33 nominations.
